service.query: SELECT 'F' AS CHECK_FLAG , CASE WHEN (NVL(RSLT_AMT,0) + NVL(PR_DIV_RECV_AMT,0) + NVL(SD_DIV_RECV_AMT,0) + NVL(ADJST_RECV_AMT,0) - NVL(PR_DIV_AMT,0) - NVL(SD_DIV_AMT,0) - NVL(ADJST_AMT,0)) > 0 AND BIZ.SD_DIV_CD IS NULL THEN '1' WHEN (NVL(RSLT_AMT,0) + NVL(PR_DIV_RECV_AMT,0) + NVL(SD_DIV_RECV_AMT,0) + NVL(ADJST_RECV_AMT,0) - NVL(PR_DIV_AMT,0) - NVL(SD_DIV_AMT,0) - NVL(ADJST_AMT,0)) > 0 AND BIZ.SD_DIV_CD = '' THEN '1' ELSE '0' END AS EDIT_FLAG , BIZ.BIZ_RSLT_YM , ORG.STR_CD , BIZ.ORG_FLAG , BIZ.ORG_CD , ORG.ORG_NAME , CASE WHEN ORG.ORG_LEVEL >= '2' THEN DPS.FN_GET_ORG_SHORT_NAME(ORG.STR_CD, ORG.DEPT_CD, '00', '00', '00') ELSE '' END AS DEPT_NM , CASE WHEN ORG.ORG_LEVEL >= '3' THEN DPS.FN_GET_ORG_SHORT_NAME(ORG.STR_CD, ORG.DEPT_CD, ORG.TEAM_CD, '00', '00') ELSE '' END AS TEAM_NM , CASE WHEN ORG.ORG_LEVEL >= '4' THEN DPS.FN_GET_ORG_SHORT_NAME(ORG.STR_CD, ORG.DEPT_CD, ORG.TEAM_CD, ORG.PC_CD, '00') ELSE '' END AS PC_NM /* , BIZ.RSLT_AMT */ , (NVL(RSLT_AMT,0) + NVL(ADJST_RECV_AMT,0) + NVL(PR_DIV_RECV_AMT,0) + NVL(SD_DIV_RECV_AMT,0) - ( NVL(ADJST_AMT,0) + NVL(PR_DIV_AMT,0) + NVL(SD_DIV_AMT,0) )) AS RSLT_AMT , BIZ.PR_DIV_CD , BIZ.PR_DIV_BIZ_CD , ( SELECT BIZ_CD_NM FROM MSS.ME_BIZCDMST WHERE BIZ_CD = BIZ.PR_DIV_BIZ_CD ) AS BIZ_CD_NM , BIZ.BIZ_CD , MST.BIZ_CD_NM AS BIZ_NM , LST.PR_DIV_CD AS LST_DIV_CD , LST.PR_DIV_BIZ_CD AS LST_BIZ_CD , LST.LST_BIZ_NM FROM MSS.ME_BIZRSLT BIZ , DPS.PC_ORGMST ORG , MSS.ME_BIZCDMST MST , ( SELECT A.BIZ_CD , A.ORG_CD , A.PR_DIV_CD , A.PR_DIV_BIZ_CD , B.BIZ_CD_NM AS LST_BIZ_NM FROM MSS.ME_BIZRSLT A , MSS.ME_BIZCDMST B WHERE A.PR_DIV_BIZ_CD = B.BIZ_CD AND STR_CD = ? AND BIZ_RSLT_YM = ?) LST WHERE BIZ.BIZ_CD = LST.BIZ_CD(+) AND BIZ.ORG_CD = LST.ORG_CD(+) AND BIZ.ORG_CD = ORG.ORG_CD(+) AND BIZ.BIZ_CD = MST.BIZ_CD AND BIZ.STR_CD = ? AND BIZ.BIZ_RSLT_YM = ? ORDER BY BIZ.ORG_CD

UPDATE MSS.ME_BIZRSLT SET PR_DIV_YN = 'Y' , PR_DIV_CD = ? , PR_DIV_BIZ_CD = ? /* , PR_DIV_AMT = RSLT_AMT */ , PR_DIV_AMT = ? , MOD_DATE = SYSDATE , MOD_ID = ? WHERE BIZ_RSLT_YM = ? AND STR_CD = ? AND ORG_CD = ? AND BIZ_CD = ?

MERGE INTO MSS.ME_BIZRSLT A USING ( SELECT ? AS BIZ_RSLT_YM , ? AS STR_CD , ? AS BIZ_CD , ? AS PR_DIV_RECV_AMT , '9999999999' AS ORG_CD , ? AS USER_ID FROM DUAL ) B ON ( A.BIZ_RSLT_YM = B.BIZ_RSLT_YM AND A.STR_CD = B.STR_CD AND A.BIZ_CD = B.BIZ_CD AND A.ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET PR_DIV_RECV_AMT = NVL(A.PR_DIV_RECV_AMT,0) + B.PR_DIV_RECV_AMT , MOD_ID = B.USER_ID , MOD_DATE = SYSDATE WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( BIZ_RSLT_YM , STR_CD , BIZ_CD , ORG_CD , ORG_FLAG , ORG_LEVEL , DEPT_CD , TEAM_CD , PC_CD , RSLT_AMT , PR_DIV_AMT , PR_DIV_RECV_AMT , SD_DIV_AMT , SD_DIV_RECV_AMT , REG_DATE , REG_ID , MOD_DATE , MOD_ID ) VALUES ( B.BIZ_RSLT_YM , B.STR_CD , B.BIZ_CD , B.ORG_CD , '1' , '2' , '99' , '99' , '99' , 0 , 0 , B.PR_DIV_RECV_AMT , 0 , 0 , SYSDATE , B.USER_ID , SYSDATE , B.USER_ID )
SELECT STR_CD , DIV_RATE FROM MSS.ME_DIVMST WHERE DIV_YM = ? AND DIV_CD = ? AND DIV_SEQ_FLAG = '1' AND PLAN_RSLT_FLAG = '2'
SELECT BIZ_CD , RSLT_AMT FROM MSS.ME_BIZRSLT WHERE BIZ_RSLT_YM = ? AND STR_CD = ? AND ORG_CD = ?

INSERT INTO MSS.ME_BIZDIVHIST( DIV_YM , DIV_RECV_STR_CD , DIV_RECV_ORG_CD , DIV_RECV_BIZ_CD , DIV_RECV_SEQ , DIV_CD , DIV_SEQ_FLAG , PLAN_RSLT_FLAG , DIV_RATE , ORG_LEVEL , DIV_RECV_AMT , DIV_STR_CD , DIV_ORG_CD , DIV_BIZ_CD , REG_DATE , REG_ID , MOD_DATE , MOD_ID ) VALUES ( ? , ? , '9999999999' , ? , ( SELECT NVL(MAX(DIV_RECV_SEQ), 0) + 1 FROM MSS.ME_BIZDIVHIST WHERE DIV_YM = ? AND DIV_RECV_STR_CD = ? AND DIV_RECV_ORG_CD = '9999999999' AND DIV_RECV_BIZ_CD = ? ) , ? , '1' , '2' , ? , '2' , ? , ? , ? , ? , SYSDATE , ? , SYSDATE , ? )
